scripts.python:
echo "Copy and run:" && echo "\033[30;43mpython3 -m venv .venv && source .venv/bin/activate && pip install -r requirements.txt\033[0m
"
scripts.pull_without_merge: COUNT=$(git rev-list --count origin/main..main) && git checkout -b new-branch-for-pull-without-merge && git checkout main && git reset --hard HEAD~$COUNT && git pull origin main && git checkout new-branch-for-pull-without-merge && git rebase main && git checkout main && git merge new-branch-for-pull-without-merge && git branch -D new-branch-for-pull-without-merge
scripts.CarFeedProcessorCSV: CSV_URL=$(grep '^CSV_URL=' .env | awk -F'=' '{print substr($0, index($0,$2))}' | sed 's/^"//; s/"$//') && curl $CSV_URL -o data.csv && python3 .github/scripts/CarFeedProcessorCSV.py
scripts.getAllNewCars: pnpm getOne_XML_URL_DATA_CARS_CAR && pnpm getOne_XML_URL_CATALOG_VEHICLES_VEHICLE && pnpm getOne_XML_URL_VEHICLES_VEHICLE && pnpm getOne_XML_URL_ADS_AD && pnpm getOne_XML_URL_CARCOPY_OFFERS_OFFER
scripts.getAllUsedCars: pnpm getOne_USED_CARS_DATA_CARS_CAR && pnpm getOne_USED_CARS_CATALOG_VEHICLES_VEHICLE && pnpm getOne_USED_CARS_VEHICLES_VEHICLE && pnpm getOne_USED_CARS_ADS_AD && pnpm getOne_USED_CARS_CARCOPY_OFFERS_OFFER
scripts.getAll: export IGNORE_ERRORS=1 && rm -rf ./tmp/feeds && pnpm run getDealerStorage_new_cars_xml && pnpm run getDealerStorage_used_cars_xml && pnpm run getOne_DEALER_PHOTOS_FOR_CARS_AVITO_URL && pnpm run getAllNewCars && pnpm run getAllUsedCars && pnpm run getAirStorage && pnpm run getSortStorage && pnpm run getDealerCarsPrice
scripts.dd: export IGNORE_ERRORS=1 && pnpm downloadJSON && pnpm getDealerPrices && pnpm mergeCarPrices && pnpm replacePlaceholdersAndSearchDates && pnpm dev
scripts.ddw: powershell -Command "pnpm downloadJSON_win; pnpm getDealerPrices; pnpm mergeCarPrices; pnpm replacePlaceholdersAndSearchDates; pnpm dev"
scripts.linkinator: astro dev --port 4343 & sleep 5 && npx linkinator http://localhost:4343 --recurse --format CSV  > linkinator.csv
scripts.broken_links: astro dev --port 4343 & sleep 5 && export DOMAIN=localhost:4343 && node .github/scripts/checkLinks.js
scripts.lighthouse: astro build && astro preview --port 4343 & sleep 5 && npx lighthouse http://localhost:4343 --output=json --output-path=./lighthouse-report-$(date +%Y-%m-%d-%H-%M-%S).json
scripts.downloadJSON_win: powershell -Command "$jsonPath = (Get-Content .env | Select-String 'JSON_PATH=').ToString().Split('=')[1]; $folderName = (Get-Content .env | Select-String 'DOMAIN=').ToString().Split('=')[1]; Write-Host \"Using JSON_PATH: $jsonPath\"; Write-Host \"Using folder_name: $folderName\"; $dir = 'src/data'; if (-Not (Test-Path $dir)) { New-Item -ItemType Directory -Path $dir }; $files = @('banners.json', 'cars.json', 'models.json', 'salons.json', 'scripts.json', 'seo.json', 'services.json', 'settings.json', 'socials.json', 'special-services.json', 'faq.json', 'federal-models_price.json', 'reviews.json', 'models-sections.yml'); foreach ($file in $files) { $url = \"$jsonPath/$folderName/data/$file\"; $output = \"src/data/$file\"; $response = Invoke-WebRequest -Uri $url -Method Head -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; if ($response.StatusCode -eq 200) { Write-Host \"Downloading $url\"; Invoke-WebRequest -Uri $url -OutFile $output } else { Write-Host \"File $url does not exist on server. Skipping download.\" } }"
